content: baby yoda and bassinet by jana whitley march 2020 tools and materials worsted weight yarn in light green light brown brown and light gray 2 6mm black plastic safety eyes stuffing about 1 handful e and f hooks scissors large-head pins tapestry needle stitch marker such as 3 inches of contrasting yarn or a safety pin note do not join rounds at the end of a round use a stitch marker to keep track of the end of the last round baby yoda head and body with e hook and light green make magic loop rnd1 single_crochet 5 in magic loop 5 sts rnd2 single_crochet 2 in each single_crochet around 10 sts rnd3 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 5 times 15 sts rnd4 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 5 times 20 sts rnd5-6 2 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 sts switch to light brown rnd7-8 2 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 sts switch to brown rnd9-10 2 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 sts attach eyes between rounds 5 and 6 three stitches apart position the eyes on the opposite side of the head from the color switches rnd11 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease repeat 5 times 15 sts rnd12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 sts stuff almost to last round rnd13 single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease repeat 5 times 10 sts finish stuffing rnd14 decrease 5 5 sts fasten_off with tail whipstitch through front loops of last 5 stitches and pull to close hole hide tail inside body ears make 2 with e hook and light green r1 chain 6 r2 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chain half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in last chain fasten_off with tail for sewing to head with pins position ears symmetrically with right sides of ear crochet work facing forward with tapestry needle and ear tail sew the last stitch of ear to side of head with 3 or 4 stitches hide ends inside body repeat for other ear bassinet top with light gray yarn and f hook make magic loop rnd1 single_crochet 5 in magic loop 5 sts rnd2 single_crochet 2 in each single_crochet around 10 sts rnd3 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 5 times 15 sts rnd4 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 5 times 20 sts rnd5 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat 5 times 25 sts rnd6-10 5 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 25 sts after r9 check fit of top over head if r9 goes down to the start of the darker brown round you can omit round 10 fasten_off and weave in ends bassinet bottom with light gray yarn and f hook make magic loop rnd1 single_crochet 5 in magic loop 5 sts rnd2 single_crochet 2 in each single_crochet around 10 sts rnd3 single_crochet 2 in next single_crochet
